AphroditeWeaponBoon.name: Flutter Strike
AphroditeWeaponBoon.description: Your Attacks deal more damage to nearby foes.

AphroditeSpecialBoon.name: Flutter Flourish
AphroditeSpecialBoon.description: Your Specials deal more damage to nearby foes.

AphroditeCastBoon.name: Rapture Ring
AphroditeCastBoon.description: Your Casts inflict Weak, and damage foes while dragging them toward the center.

AphroditeSprintBoon.name: Passion Rush
AphroditeSprintBoon.description: Rushing damages surrounding foes and inflicts Weak, and again once you stop.

AphroditeManaBoon.name: Glamour Gain
AphroditeManaBoon.description: You automatically inflict Weak on nearby foes and gradually restore Magick near them.

HighHealthOffenseBoon.name: Shameless Attitude
HighHealthOffenseBoon.description: You deal more damage. While you have at least 80% Health, the bonus is doubled.

HealthRewardBonusBoon.name: Spiritual Affirmation
HealthRewardBonusBoon.description: Gain Max Health and Max Magick now and for the rest of this night.

DoorHealToFullBoon.name: Healthy Rebound
DoorHealToFullBoon.description: Whenever you exit a Location, restore 100% Health if you have not lost too much.

ManaBurstBoon.name: Heart Breaker
ManaBurstBoon.description: Whenever you use 40 Magick, create a Heartthrob.

ElementalDodgeBoon.name: Wispy Wiles
ElementalDodgeBoon.description: Gain a chance to Dodge for each Air you have.

RandomStatusBoon.name: Nervous Wreck
RandomStatusBoon.description: Whenever you inflict Weak, also randomly inflict Curses from other Olympians.

ApolloWeaponBoon.name: Nova Strike
ApolloWeaponBoon.description: Your Attacks deal more damage in a larger area.

ApolloSpecialBoon.name: Nova Flourish
ApolloSpecialBoon.description: Your Specials deal more damage in a larger area.

ApolloCastBoon.name: Solar Ring
ApolloCastBoon.description: Your Casts inflict Daze, and deal a burst of damage before they expire.

ApolloSprintBoon.name: Blinding Rush
ApolloSprintBoon.description: Your Sprint is faster and inflicts Daze on surrounding foes.

ApolloManaBoon.name: Lucid Gain
ApolloManaBoon.description: If you stand in your Casts when they expire, immediately restore Magick.

ApolloRetaliateBoon.name: Light Smite
ApolloRetaliateBoon.description: After you take damage, your foe takes damage and you inflict Daze on all foes in the vicinity.

PerfectDamageBonusBoon.name: Perfect Image
PerfectDamageBonusBoon.description: You deal more damage until you take damage. If you take no more for 15 Sec., regain this.

ApolloBlindBoon.name: Back Burner
ApolloBlindBoon.description: Foes with Daze take more damage if struck from behind.

ApolloExCastBoon.name: Prominence Flare
ApolloExCastBoon.description: After your Omega Cast expires, rapidly deal damage in the area for 2 Sec.

ApolloCastAreaBoon.name: Super Nova
ApolloCastAreaBoon.description: Your Casts expand in size until they expire.

DoubleStrikeChanceBoon.name: Extra Dose
DoubleStrikeChanceBoon.description: Your Attack has a chance to hit 2 times.

ElementalRallyBoon.name: Self Healing
ElementalRallyBoon.description: While you have at least 3 Fire, whenever you take damage, restore some Health.

DoubleExManaBoon.name: Exceptional Talent
DoubleExManaBoon.description: Your Omega Attack and Omega Special fire 2 times, but use more Magick.

DoubleExManaBoon_Torch.name: Exceptional Talent
DoubleExManaBoon_Torch.description: Your Omega Attack fires 2 times, but uses more Magick.

AresWeaponBoon.name: Vicious Strike
AresWeaponBoon.description: Your Attacks deal more damage and inflict Wounds.

AresSpecialBoon.name: Vicious Flourish
AresSpecialBoon.description: Your Specials deal more damage and inflict Wounds.

AresCastBoon.name: Sword Ring
AresCastBoon.description: Your Casts create a falling blade over each foe in the binding circle.

AresSprintBoon.name: Stabbing Rush
AresSprintBoon.description: Your Dash creates a row of falling blades along your path.

AresManaBoon.name: Grisly Gain
AresManaBoon.description: Striking foes with your Weapon may spill Plasma, which also restores 10 Magick.

AresExCastBoon.name: Meat Grinder
AresExCastBoon.description: Your Omega Cast also creates a Blade Rift in the binding circle.

RendBloodDropBoon.name: Profuse Bleeding
RendBloodDropBoon.description: Whenever foes with Wounds take damage, they may spill Plasma.

AresStatusDoubleDamageBoon.name: Grievous Blow
AresStatusDoubleDamageBoon.description: Foes with Wounds may suffer 200% damage when struck.

BloodDropRevengeBoon.name: Visceral Impact
BloodDropRevengeBoon.description: Afer you take damage or a foe is slain, spill Plasma, sometimes twice.

MissingHealthCritBoon.name: Mutual Destruction
MissingHealthCritBoon.description: Gain a chance to deal 200% damage that increases the less Health you have remaining.

LowHealthLifestealBoon.name: Blood Spree
LowHealthLifestealBoon.description: While you have less than 40 Health, your Attacks and Specials restore Health.

OmegaDelayedDamageBoon.name: Cut Above
OmegaDelayedDamageBoon.description: Your Omega Moves also cause a falling blade to appear over each foe stroke, but use +5 Magick.

ElementalOlympianDamageBoon.name: Rallying Cry
ElementalOlympianDamageBoon.description: While you have at least 8 Earth, any of your damaging effects from Olympians are stronger.

DoubleBloodDropBoon.name: Sanguinary Savor
DoubleBloodDropBoon.description: Any Plasma spilled has improved potency and is drawn to you automatically.

DemeterWeaponBoon.name: Ice Strike
DemeterWeaponBoon.description: Your Attacks deal more damage and inflict Freeze.

DemeterSpecialBoon.name: Ice Flourish
DemeterSpecialBoon.description: Your Specials deal more damage and inflict Freeze.

DemeterCastBoon.name: Arctic Ring
DemeterCastBoon.description: Your Casts inflict Freeze and repeatedly deal damage to foes in the binding circle.

DemeterSprintBoon.name: Frigid Rush
DemeterSprintBoon.description: Your Sprint forms a Gust around you that lingers after you stop.

DemeterManaBoon.name: Tranquil Gain
DemeterManaBoon.description: After remaining inactive for 0.5 Sec., rapidly restores Magick until you act.

CastNovaBoon.name: Arctic Gale
CastNovaBoon.description: Your Casts also create a Gust at the binding circle.

PlantHealthBoon.name: Plentiful Forage
PlantHealthBoon.description: Whenever you gather resources from a Location, restore Health. Receive 1 Mystery Seed now.

BoonGrowthBoon.name: Steady Growth
BoonGrowthBoon.description: Whenever you clear enough Encounters, a random Boon you have gains Rarity.

ReserveManaHitShieldBoon.name: Snow Queen
ReserveManaHitShieldBoon.description: Gain a barrier that stops 1 instance of damage in each Location, but you Prime Magick.

SlowExAttackBoon.name: Weed Killer
SlowExAttackBoon.description: Your Omega Attack deals more damage, but uses +10 Magick.

CastAttachBoon.name: Local Climate
CastAttachBoon.description: Your Omega Cast deals more damage. If you are in the binding circle, the bonus is doubled.

ElementalDamageCapBoon.name: Frosty Veneer
ElementalDamageCapBoon.description: While you have at least 6 Water, whenever you would take at least 20 damage, take less.

InstantRootKill.name: Winter Harvest
InstantRootKill.description: Freeze-afflicted foes shatter at 10% Health, dealing damage in the area.

HephaestusWeaponBoon.name: Volcanic Strike
HephaestusWeaponBoon.description: Your Attacks can cause a blast that deals 400 damage in the area.

HephaestusSpecialBoon.name: Volcanic Flourish
HephaestusSpecialBoon.description: Your Specials can cause a blast that deals 500 damage in the area.

HephaestusCastBoon.name: Anvil Ring
HephaestusCastBoon.description: Your Casts deal damage 3 times in succession to foes in the binding circle.

HephaestusSprintBoon.name: Smithy Rush
HephaestusSprintBoon.description: If a foe is near after you Dash, you can cause a blast that deals 200 damage in the area.

HephaestusManaBoon.name: Tough Gain
HephaestusManaBoon.description: Whenever you take damage, shrug some of it off and restore 150 Magick.

MassiveDamageBoon.name: Grand Caldera
MassiveDamageBoon.description: Your blast effects from Hephaestus deal more damage and are 50% larger.

AntiArmorBoon.name: Molten Touch
AntiArmorBoon.description: Your Attacks and Specials deal bonus damage to Armor.

HeavyArmorBoon.name: Heavy Metal
HeavyArmorBoon.description: Your Weapon deals more damage based on 20% of your Armor, and you gain some now.

ArmorBoon.name: Trusty Shield
ArmorBoon.description: Whenever you enter a Location, gain Armor for that Location, but you Prime 30 Magick.

EncounterStartDefenseBuffBoon.name: Security System
EncounterStartDefenseBuffBoon.description: At the start of each Encounter, you gain Armor that lasts for 7 Sec.

ManaToHealthBoon.name: Uncanny Fortitude
ManaToHealthBoon.description: Gain bonus Health based on your Magick limit.

MassiveKnockupBoon.name: Furnace Blast
MassiveKnockupBoon.description: Your blast effects from Hephaestus also inflict Glow on foes.

ElementalDamageBoon.name: Martial Art
ElementalDamageBoon.description: Your Attack and Special deal more damage for each Earth you have.

WeaponUpgradeBoon.name: Premium Service
WeaponUpgradeBoon.description: Your Aspect of the Nocturnal Arms is even stronger.

HeraWeaponBoon.name: Sworn Strike
HeraWeaponBoon.description: Your Attacks deal more damage and inflict Hitch.

HeraSpecialBoon.name: Sworn Flourish
HeraSpecialBoon.description: Your Specials deal more damage and inflict Hitch.

HeraCastBoon.name: Engagement Ring
HeraCastBoon.description: Your Casts inflict Hitch and immediately deal damage based on foes in the binding circle.

HeraSprintBoon.name: Nexus Rush
HeraSprintBoon.description: Your Sprint inflicts Hitch on contact with foes, and deals damage when it does.

HeraManaBoon.name: Born Gain
HeraManaBoon.description: Whenever you run out of Magick, Prime until the next Location to restore all Magick.

DamageShareRetaliateBoon.name: Extended Family
DamageShareRetaliateBoon.description: Your damaging effects from Olympians are stronger for each Boon-giver you have.

LinkedDeathDamageBoon.name: Dying Wish
LinkedDeathDamageBoon.description: Whenever Hitch-afflicted foes are slain, damage all other Hitch-afflicted foes.

BoonDecayBoon.name: Bridal Glow
BoonDecayBoon.description: Make 1 random Boon become Heroic and give it +Lv.

DamageSharePotencyBoon.name: Hereditary Bane
DamageSharePotencyBoon.description: Your Hitch effects deal more damage and last +5 Sec.

SpawnCastDamageBoon.name: Rousing Reception
SpawnCastDamageBoon.description: Your Casts damage any foes as they join the Encounter, wherever they appear.

CommonGlobalDamageBoon.name: Uncommon Grace
CommonGlobalDamageBoon.description: While none of your other Boons are Common, deal more damage.

OmegaHeraProjectileBoon.name: Fine Line
OmegaHeraProjectileBoon.description: Your Omega Moves create a fissure that deals damage in a long line, but use +15 Magick.

ElementalRarityUpgradeBoon.name: Proper Upbringing
ElementalRarityUpgradeBoon.description: While you have at least 2 Earth, Water, Air and Fire Elements, all your Common Boons gain Rarity.

AllElementalBoon.name: All Together
AllElementalBoon.description: Gain Earth Water Air and Fire Elements, and 1 Infusion Boon for each.

HestiaCastBoon.name: Smolder Ring
HestiaCastBoon.description: Your Casts repeatedly inflict Scorch on foes in the binding circle.

HestiaSprintBoon.name: Heat Rush
HestiaSprintBoon.description: Your Sprint leaves a cinder trail, and any damage you take from burning is reduced to 1.

HestiaManaBoon.name: Cardio Gain
HestiaManaBoon.description: Whenever your Attack or Special deal damage, restore Magick.

OmegaZeroBurnBoon.name: Highly Flammable
OmegaZeroBurnBoon.description: Whenever you inflict Scorch on a foe for the first time, inflict more.

CastProjectileBoon.name: Glowing Coal
CastProjectileBoon.description: Hold Cast to aim a fireball that explodes on impact. The binding circle forms there.

FireballManaSpecialBoon.name: Controlled Burn
FireballManaSpecialBoon.description: Your Omega Special also launches a fireball, but uses +10 Magick.

BurnExplodeBoon.name: Flash Fry
BurnExplodeBoon.description: Your foes perish in a blast that damages any surrounding foes.

BurnArmorBoon.name: Hot Pot
BurnArmorBoon.description: Gain a chance to Dodge, which is doubled against Scorch-afflicted foes.

AloneDamageBoon.name: Snuffed Candle
AloneDamageBoon.description: You deal more damage to foes that are nowhere near other foes.

ElementalBaseDamageBoon.name: Slow Cooker
ElementalBaseDamageBoon.description: Your Attacks and Specials gain Power the more Fire you have.

BurnSprintBoon.name: Fire Away
BurnSprintBoon.description: Your Casts destroy many foes' ranged shots, and inflict Scorch on the attacking foes.

PoseidonWeaponBoon.name: Wave Strike
PoseidonWeaponBoon.description: Your Attacks hit foes with a splash that knocks other foes away.

PoseidonSpecialBoon.name: Wave Flourish
PoseidonSpecialBoon.description: Your Specials hit foes with a splash that knocks other foes away.

PoseidonCastBoon.name: Tidal Ring
PoseidonCastBoon.description: Your Casts also immediately hit foes with a powerful splash that inflicts Froth.

PoseidonSprintBoon.name: Breaker Rush
PoseidonSprintBoon.description: Whenever you Sprint, hit the first foe you run into with a blast that knocks foes away.

PoseidonManaBoon.name: Flood Gain
PoseidonManaBoon.description: Your Omega Moves make you briefly restore any Magick you use, repeatable after 8 Sec.

EncounterStartOffenseBuffBoon.name: Hydraulic Might
EncounterStartOffenseBuffBoon.description: At the start of each Encounter, your Attacks and Specials are stronger for 10 Sec.

RoomRewardBonusBoon.name: Buried Treasure
RoomRewardBonusBoon.description: Any Minor Finds and Gold are worth more, and you receive Gold, Health, and Bones now.

FocusDamageShaveBoon.name: High Surf
FocusDamageShaveBoon.description: Hit surrounding foes with a powerful splash as they start to strike, but you Prime 30 Magick.

DoubleRewardBoon.name: Sea Star
DoubleRewardBoon.description: Whenever you claim rewards other than Boons, Daedalus Hammer, or rare resources, a copy may appear.

PoseidonStatusBoon.name: Slippery Slope
PoseidonStatusBoon.description: Your splash effects from Poseidon also inflict Froth, and Froth deals more damage.

PoseidonExCastBoon.name: Geyser Spout
PoseidonExCastBoon.description: Your Omega Cast gains Power and knocks foes away.

OmegaPoseidonProjectileBoon.name: Ocean Swell
OmegaPoseidonProjectileBoon.description: Your Omega Moves also launch a wide wave ahead that knocks foes away, but use +5 Magick.

AmplifyConeBoon.name: King Tide
AmplifyConeBoon.description: Your splash effects from Poseidon are larger and deal bonus damage to Guardians.

ZeusCastBoon.name: Storm Ring
ZeusCastBoon.description: Your Casts cause lightning bolts to repeatedly strike 1 foe at a time in the binding circle.

ZeusSprintBoon.name: Thunder Rush
ZeusSprintBoon.description: Dashing causes surrounding foes to be struck by lightning bolts.

ZeusManaBoon.name: Ionic Gain
ZeusManaBoon.description: In each Encounter, an Aether Font appears in the area and restores all Magick when used.

ZeusManaBoltBoon.name: Power Surge
ZeusManaBoltBoon.description: Whenever you use Magick, a random surrounding foe is struck by lightning.

BoltRetaliateBoon.name: Divine Vengeance
BoltRetaliateBoon.description: After you take damage, your foe is struck by lightning, and again 50% of the time.

CastAnywhereBoon.name: Lightning Lance
CastAnywhereBoon.description: Hold Cast to aim where the binding circle appears. Foes within are struck by lightning.

FocusLightningBoon.name: Static Shock
FocusLightningBoon.description: Your strikes emit chain-lightning that bounces up to 4 times, but you Prime 50 Magick.

DoubleBoltBoon.name: Double Strike
DoubleBoltBoon.description: Your lightning bolt effects may strike 2 more times.

EchoExpirationBoon.name: Arc Flash
EchoExpirationBoon.description:
Damage from

Omega Moves

immediately activates

Blitz

effects and makes them stronger.

LightningDebuffGeneratorBoon.name: Electric Overload
LightningDebuffGeneratorBoon.description: Your chain-lightning deals more damage and bounces up to +3 times.

ElementalDamageFloorBoon.name: Air Quality
ElementalDamageFloorBoon.description: While you have at least 5 Air, you can never deal less damage than the limit.

SpawnKillBoon.name: Shocking Loss
SpawnKillBoon.description: Whenever you first deal damage to susceptible foes, you may destroy them outright.

SprintEchoBoon.name: Romantic Spark
SprintEchoBoon.description: Whenever you Sprint into foes with Blitz, the effect strikes right away for more damage.

CharmCrowdBoon.name: Ecstatic Obsession
CharmCrowdBoon.description: As long as multiple foes are in an Encounter, automatically inflict Charm on 1 of them.

AllCloseBoon.name: Island Getaway
AllCloseBoon.description: You take less damage from nearby foes. Boons of Aphrodite treats all foes as nearby.

MaxHealthDamageBoon.name: Hearty Appetite
MaxHealthDamageBoon.description: You deal more damage the more Health you have.

BurnRefreshBoon.name: Burning Desire
BurnRefreshBoon.description: While foes are Weak, any Scorch they have does not diminish as it deals damage.

SlamManaBurstBoon.name: Love Handles
SlamManaBurstBoon.description: Your blast effects from Hephaestus also create a Heartthrob.

BloodManaBurstBoon.name: Carnal Pleasure
BloodManaBurstBoon.description: Whenever you collect a Plasma, create a Heartthrob.

ApolloSecondStageCastBoon.name: Glorious Disaster
ApolloSecondStageCastBoon.description: You can Channel +30 Magick into your Omega Cast to repeatedly strike foes with lightning bolts.

RaiseDeadBoon.name: Sun Worshiper
RaiseDeadBoon.description: In each Encounter, the first foe you slay returns to fight for you.

PoseidonSplashSprintBoon.name: Beach Ball
PoseidonSplashSprintBoon.description: Your Sprint creates a watery globe behind you, which surges ahead once you stop.

StormSpawnBoon.name: Tropical Cyclone
StormSpawnBoon.description: While standing in a Gust, you randomly fire gales every 0.3 Sec.

CoverRegenerationBoon.name: Warm Breeze
CoverRegenerationBoon.description: Whenever you Dodge or Daze causes a foe to miss, restore some Health.

BlindClearBoon.name: Rude Awakening
BlindClearBoon.description: Your blast effects from Hephaestus clear Daze and deal more damage if they do.

DoubleSwordBoon.name: Cutting Edge
DoubleSwordBoon.description: Your falling blades from Ares drop +1 time in succession and deal damage in a larger area.

SelfCastBoon.name: Hostile Environment
SelfCastBoon.description: Your Omega Cast is stronger and follows you, even as you start to Channel it.

AutoRevengeBoon.name: Heinous Affront
AutoRevengeBoon.description: Inflicting Wounds, occasionally also inflicts all your 'after you take damage' effects.

BloodRetentionBoon.name: Universal Donor
BloodRetentionBoon.description: Whenever you exit a Location, keep some of your Plasma bonuses.

RapidSwordBoon.name: Coffin Nail
RapidSwordBoon.description: Your falling blades from Ares fall immediately and deal more damage.

DoubleSplashBoon.name: Arterial Spray
DoubleSplashBoon.description: Your splash effects from Poseidon may hit 2 times (and take the color of the River Styx).

FireballRendBoon.name: Fourth Degree
FireballRendBoon.description: Your fireball effects from Hestia inflict Wounds with even greater Power.

RootStrikeBoon.name: Hail Storm
RootStrikeBoon.description: Your Freeze effects also cause lightning bolts to repeatedly strike afflicted foes.

KeepsakeLevelBoon.name: Cherished Heirloom
KeepsakeLevelBoon.description: Your Keepsakes are stronger this night (if possible).

GoodStuffBoon.name: Natural Selection
GoodStuffBoon.description: Your Boon(s) in the leftmost column gain Levels spread across however many you got.

effects.text: Total Bonus Lv. for Main Boon(s):

BurnConsumeBoon.name: Freezer Burn
BurnConsumeBoon.description: Whenever you inflict Freeze, on a foe with Scorch, deal damage and remove Scorch.

ClearRootBoon.name: Cryo Pounder
ClearRootBoon.description: Your blast effects from Hephaestus deal more damage to Freeze-afflicted foes.

ManaShieldBoon.name: Brave Face
ManaShieldBoon.description: Automatically use Magick to resist up to 30% of any damage.

ReboundingSparkBoon.name: Master Conductor
ReboundingSparkBoon.description: Your chain-lightning can bounce off of you and deals increasing damage to foes.

MassiveCastBoon.name: Seismic Servo
MassiveCastBoon.description: Any Boon effects that recharge overtime recharge faster.

DoubleMassiveAttackBoon.name: Chain Reaction
DoubleMassiveAttackBoon.description: If you use your blast effects from Hephaestus just after they recharge, they fire 2 times.

SuperSacrificeBoonHera.name: Queen's Ransom
SuperSacrificeBoonHera.description: Give up all your Boons of Zeus. For each, raise Levels for all your Boons of Hera.

MoneyDamageBoon.name: Ripple Effect
MoneyDamageBoon.description: Your effects from Fine Line and Ocean Swell have a chance to fire 2 times.

ManaRestoreDamageBoon.name: Incandescent Aura
ManaRestoreDamageBoon.description: Whenever you restore Magick during Encounters, damage all Hitch-afflicted foes.

EchoBurnBoon.name: Thermal Dynamics
EchoBurnBoon.description: Your Blitz effects also inflict Scorch whenever they deal damage.

SteamBoon.name: Scalding Vapor
SteamBoon.description: If foes with Froth are struck by your fire effects from Hestia, they are engulfed in Steam.

LightningVulnerabilityBoon.name: Killer Current
LightningVulnerabilityBoon.description: Your lightning deals more damage to Froth-afflicted foes.

SuperSacrificeBoonZeus.name: King's Ransom
SuperSacrificeBoonZeus.description: Give up all your Boons of Hera. For each, raise Levels for all your Boons of Zeus.

StaffLongAttackTrait.name: Extending Wallop
StaffLongAttackTrait.description: Your Attack has more range and deals +100% damage to distant foes.

StaffDashAttackTrait.name: Melting Swipe
StaffDashAttackTrait.description: Your Dash-Strike hits a larger area and destroys +900 damage to Armor.

StaffTripleShotTrait.name: Dual Moonshot
StaffTripleShotTrait.description: Your Specials fire 2 projectiles, but have -40% range.

StaffJumpSpecialTrait.name: Shimmering Moonshot
StaffJumpSpecialTrait.description: Your Specials bounces toward up to +2 foes, dealing +10% damage for each hit.

StaffExAoETrait.name: Cross Cataclysm
StaffExAoETrait.description: Your Omega Attack deals +50% damage and also strikes sideways.

StaffExHealTrait.name: Vampiric Cataclysm
StaffExHealTrait.description: Whenever you slay a foe with your Omega Attack, restore 5 Health.

StaffSecondStageTrait.name: Giga Moonburst
StaffSecondStageTrait.description: You can Channel +30 Magick in your Omega Special to deal +300% damage in a larger area.

StaffPowershotTrait.name: Aetheric Moonburst
StaffPowershotTrait.description: Your Omega Special gains a Power Shot that deals +50% damage and restores 20 Magick.

StaffOneWayAttackTrait.name: Mirrored Thrasher
StaffOneWayAttackTrait.description: Your Attacks hit 2 times, but use 5 Magick.

StaffRaiseDeadBigTrait.name: Soulfilled Ankh
StaffRaiseDeadBigTrait.description: Your Attacks have +5 Power and hit a larger area.

StaffRaiseDeadDoubleTrait.name: Mirrored Ankh
StaffRaiseDeadDoubleTrait.description: Your Omega Attack creates +1 damage field ahead of the first.

StaffLoneShadeRespawnTrait.name: Scarab Etchings
StaffLoneShadeRespawnTrait.description: Lone Shades deal +50 damage and have 75% chance to reappear after striking a foe.

StaffLoneShadeRallyTrait.name: Pharaoh Etchings
StaffLoneShadeRallyTrait.description: Lone Shades deal +50% damage and launch at foes struck by Omega Special.

DaggerBlinkAoETrait.name: Sweeping Ambush
DaggerBlinkAoETrait.description: Your Omega Attack deals +400% damage in a wider area, but uses +20 Magick.

DaggerSpecialJumpTrait.name: Dancing Knives
DaggerSpecialJumpTrait.description: Your Specials deal +15% damage and each hit bounces toward up to 2 more foes.

DaggerSpecialLineTrait.name: Sureshot Flurry
DaggerSpecialLineTrait.description: Your Omega Special fires each shot straight ahead and your Specials have +30% range.

DaggerSpecialConsecutiveTrait.name: Melting Sickle
DaggerSpecialConsecutiveTrait.description: Each hit from your Special deals +500 damage to Armor.

DaggerBackstabTrait.name: Skulking Onslaught
DaggerBackstabTrait.description: Your Attacks deal +150% damage striking foes from behind.

DaggerSpecialReturnTrait.name: Reaper Knives
DaggerSpecialReturnTrait.description: Your Specials have +15 Power and deal damage in a wider area.

DaggerSpecialFanTrait.name: Hidden Knives
DaggerSpecialFanTrait.description: Your Specials deal +20% damage and your Omega Special fires +3 shots.

DaggerAttackFinisherTrait.name: Final Slice
DaggerAttackFinisherTrait.description: The last strike in your Attack sequence deals +300% damage in a larger area.

DaggerDashAttackTripleTrait.name: Trick Knives
DaggerDashAttackTripleTrait.description: Your Dash-Strike also fires your Special 3 times at once in a fan pattern.

DaggerTripleRepeatWomboTrait.name: Banshee Brand
DaggerTripleRepeatWomboTrait.description: Your Blood Triad has 33% chance to strike once more.

TorchSpecialSpeedTrait.name: Clean Coil
TorchSpecialSpeedTrait.description: You Channel your Omega Special 20% faster, and it uses -10 Magick.

TorchAttackSpeedTrait.name: Furious Blaze
TorchAttackSpeedTrait.description: While you Channel your Attacks, you move and fire 20% faster.

TorchSplitAttackTrait.name: Dividing Blaze
TorchSplitAttackTrait.description: Your Attacks split in 2 the first time they strike foes.

TorchEnhancedAttackTrait.name: Inverted Blaze
TorchEnhancedAttackTrait.description: Your Attacks linger for +2 Sec. and launch back towards you after you Dash.

TorchDiscountExAttackTrait.name: Sudden Burst
TorchDiscountExAttackTrait.description: You Channel your Omega Attack 50% faster, and it uses -1 Magick.

TorchLongevityTrait.name: Rising Helix
TorchLongevityTrait.description: Your Specials grow in size and deal up to +25% damage the longer they are active.

TorchSpinAttackTrait.name: Leaden Blaze
TorchSpinAttackTrait.description: Your Attacks knock foes away and have +10 Power.

TorchAutofireSprintTrait.name: Demonic Cell
TorchAutofireSprintTrait.description: As long as you Sprint, your Attacks and Specials have +5 Power.

TorchMoveSpeedTrait.name: Mega Blaze
TorchMoveSpeedTrait.description: Your Attacks fire 20% farther and deal +30% damage.

AxeSturdyTrait.name: Colossus Slash
AxeSturdyTrait.description: Your Attacks have +10 Power and you take -20% damage while using them.

AxeDashAttackTrait.name: Dashing Heave
AxeDashAttackTrait.description: Your Dash-Strike hits 2 times in an area around you.

AxeMassiveThirdStrikeTrait.name: Executioner's Chop
AxeMassiveThirdStrikeTrait.description: The final move in your Attack sequence hits 2 times, but uses 20 Magick.

AxeSpinSpeedTrait.name: Furious Whirlwind
AxeSpinSpeedTrait.description: You Channel your Omega Attack faster, and move 50% faster while it is active.

AxeSecondStageTrait.name: Giga Cleaver
AxeSecondStageTrait.description: Your Omega Special fires 2 times in succession, but costs +15 Magick.

AxeRallyFirstStrikeTrait.name: Heaven Splitter
AxeRallyFirstStrikeTrait.description: Your Attacks hits 2 times, but the 5-strike sequence becomes only the first slam.

AxeThirdStrikeTrait.name: Hell Splitter
AxeThirdStrikeTrait.description: Your Attack has +300 Power, but the 3-strike sequence becomes only the final chop.

AxeRallyFrenzyTrait.name: Iron Core
AxeRallyFrenzyTrait.description: Your Berserk lasts +2 Sec. and restores +1 Life per foe struck.

AxeArmorTrait.name: Melting Shredder
AxeArmorTrait.description: Each hit from your Special deals +300 damage to Armor.

AxeFreeSpinTrait.name: Psychic Whirlwind
AxeFreeSpinTrait.description: During your Omega Attack, you are free to use your Attacks and Specials.

AxeRangedWhirlwindTrait.name: Seething Marauder
AxeRangedWhirlwindTrait.description: Your Attacks also deals 60 damage to surrounding foes, for each and every strike.

AxeBlockEmpowerTrait.name: Siege Shredder
AxeBlockEmpowerTrait.description: Your Special strikes farther ahead and deals +150% damage.

LobStraightShotTrait.name: Boosted Ignition
LobStraightShotTrait.description: After your Dash or Specials, your Attacks are faster and have +15 Power.

LobSturdySpecialTrait.name: Colossus Driver
LobSturdySpecialTrait.description: Your Specials have +30 Power and you take -30% damage while using them.

LobAmmoMagnetismTrait.name: Fetching Array
LobAmmoMagnetismTrait.description: Your Shells fly back to you automatically and 100% faster.

LobGunAttackRangeTrait.name: Garmr Gaze
LobGunAttackRangeTrait.description: Your Attacks shoot +25% farther and deal +25% damage.

LobGunAttackDoublerTrait.name: Helheim Charge
LobGunAttackDoublerTrait.description: Your Omega Attack fires +2 times in succession.

LobGunBounceTrait.name: Leering Glance
LobGunBounceTrait.description: Your Attack shots bounce toward +1 and deal +15% damage on the successive hit.

LobGrowthTrait.name: Looming Ignition
LobGrowthTrait.description: Your Attacks gain +50% damage and blast size over 0.7 Sec. before they explode.

LobOneSideTrait.name: Mega Driver
LobOneSideTrait.description: Your Specials launch you ahead faster and deal +50% damage.

LobPulseAmmoCollectTrait.name: Possessed Array
LobPulseAmmoCollectTrait.description: Your Shells fire your Omega Attack whenever retrieved, but make you lose 25 Magick.

LobGunSpecialBounceTrait.name: Runic Driver
LobGunSpecialBounceTrait.description: Your Specials fly faster and deal +15% damage for each foe struck.

LobInOutSpecialExTrait.name: Twisting Crash
LobInOutSpecialExTrait.description: After your Omega Special projectiles fire outward, they fire inward.

LobPulseAmmoTrait.name: Volatile Array
LobPulseAmmoTrait.description: Whenever your Shells land, they deal 50% of your Attack damage around them.

LobSpreadShotTrait.name: Wide Grin
LobSpreadShotTrait.description: Your Attacks fire your Shells all at once in a spread pattern.

SuitComboDoubleSpecialTrait.name: Awakened Rockets
SuitComboDoubleSpecialTrait.description: Absorbing Omega Special blasts also creates blasts from your Special, but you lose 10 Magick.

SuitPowershotTrait.name: Chakra Collider
SuitPowershotTrait.description: Your Omega Attack gains a Power Shot that deals +80% damage.

SuitSpecialBlockTrait.name: Counter Barrage
SuitSpecialBlockTrait.description: After blocking with your Omega Attack, your Special auto-fires 5 shots, reloading in 3 Sec.

SuitComboBlockBuffTrait.name: Counter Supreme
SuitComboBlockBuffTrait.description: After blocking with your Omega Attack, become Destructive by up to +3 ranks.

SuitComboForwardRocketTrait.name: Elephant Rockets
SuitComboForwardRocketTrait.description: Your Specials have +10 Power and fly dead ahead.

SuitSpecialAutoTrait.name: Launcher Frame
SuitSpecialAutoTrait.description: Whenever your Attacks strike foes, your Special has 25% chance to fire automatically.

SuitComboDashAttackTrait.name: Mooncrest Riser
SuitComboDashAttackTrait.description: Your Dash-Strike hits a larger area and deals +40% damage.

SuitAttackSizeTrait.name: Reaper Frame
SuitAttackSizeTrait.description: Your Attacks have +10 Power and deal damage in a larger area.

SuitSpecialConsecutiveHitTrait.name: Ripper Rockets
SuitSpecialConsecutiveHitTrait.description: Your Specials briefly gain +5 Power for up to 5 consecutive hits to the same foe.

SuitSpecialJumpTrait.name: Shimmering Rockets
SuitSpecialJumpTrait.description: Your Specials bounce toward up to 2 more foes.

SuitAttackRangeTrait.name: Siege Frame
SuitAttackRangeTrait.description: Your Attacks deal +30% damage and reach farther ahead.

SuitSpecialDiscountTrait.name: Sudden Salvo
SuitSpecialDiscountTrait.description: Your Omega Special locks on faster and uses -20% Magick.

BossPreDamageKeepsake.name: Knuckle Bones
BossPreDamageKeepsake.common: The next Guardian loses -5% Health. You take -10% damage from Guardians.
BossPreDamageKeepsake.rare: The next Guardian loses -10% Health. You take -10% damage from Guardians.
BossPreDamageKeepsake.epic: The next Guardian loses -15% Health. You take -10% damage from Guardians.
BossPreDamageKeepsake.heroic: The next Guardian loses -25% Health. You take -10% damage from Guardians.

BossMetaUpgradeKeepsake.name: Crystal Figurine
BossMetaUpgradeKeepsake.common: After the next Guardian, activate 2 random inactive Common Arcana Cards.
BossMetaUpgradeKeepsake.rare: After the next Guardian, activate 2 random inactive Rare Arcana Cards.
BossMetaUpgradeKeepsake.epic: After the next Guardian, activate 2 random inactive Epic Arcana Cards.
BossMetaUpgradeKeepsake.heroic: After the next Guardian, activate 2 random inactive Heroic Arcana Cards.

DoorHealReserveKeepsake.name: Ghost Onion
DoorHealReserveKeepsake.common: Whenever you exit a Location, fully restore your Health, up to a total of 50 Health this night.
DoorHealReserveKeepsake.rare: Whenever you exit a Location, fully restore your Health, up to a total of 75 Health this night.
DoorHealReserveKeepsake.epic: Whenever you exit a Location, fully restore your Health, up to a total of 100 Health this night.
DoorHealReserveKeepsake.heroic: Whenever you exit a Location, fully restore your Health, up to a total of 150 Health this night.

ReincarnationKeepsake.name: Luckier Tooth
ReincarnationKeepsake.common: After you fall to 0 Health, automatically restore 51 Health once this night.
ReincarnationKeepsake.rare: After you fall to 0 Health, automatically restore 76 Health once this night.
ReincarnationKeepsake.epic: After you fall to 0 Health, automatically restore 101 Health once this night.
ReincarnationKeepsake.heroic: After you fall to 0 Health, automatically restore 151 Health once this night.

BlockDeathKeepsake.name: Engraved Pin
BlockDeathKeepsake.common: When first you fall to 0 Health, become Doomed. Clear it in time for 30 Health.
BlockDeathKeepsake.rare: When first you fall to 0 Health, become Doomed. Clear it in time for 45 Health.
BlockDeathKeepsake.epic: When first you fall to 0 Health, become Doomed. Clear it in time for 60 Health.
BlockDeathKeepsake.heroic: When first you fall to 0 Health, become Doomed. Clear it in time for 90 Health.

DeathVengeanceKeepsake.name: Evil Eye
DeathVengeanceKeepsake.common: Deal +20% to the last foe that vanquished you.
DeathVengeanceKeepsake.rare: Deal +25% to the last foe that vanquished you.
DeathVengeanceKeepsake.epic: Deal +30% to the last foe that vanquished you.
DeathVengeanceKeepsake.heroic: Deal +40% to the last foe that vanquished you.

LowHealthCritKeepsake.name: White Antler
LowHealthCritKeepsake.common: For the next Region, gain +20% Critical damage chance, but you are limited to 30 Health.
LowHealthCritKeepsake.rare: For the next Region, gain +25% Critical damage chance, but you are limited to 30 Health.
LowHealthCritKeepsake.epic: For the next Region, gain +30% Critical damage chance, but you are limited to 30 Health.
LowHealthCritKeepsake.heroic: For the next Region, gain +50% Critical damage chance, but you are limited to 30 Health.

SpellTalentKeepsake.name: Moon Beam

SpellTalentKeepsake.rare: A reward from Selene is likely. The next Path of Stars you find grants +4 upgrades.
SpellTalentKeepsake.epic: A reward from Selene is likely. The next Path of Stars you find grants +5 upgrades.
SpellTalentKeepsake.heroic: A reward from Selene is likely. The next Path of Stars you find grants +7 upgrades.

ArmorGainKeepsake.name: Silken Sash
ArmorGainKeepsake.common: Gain +20 Armor. While you have at least 1 Armor, gain +2 Armor after each Location.
ArmorGainKeepsake.rare: Gain +20 Armor. While you have at least 1 Armor, gain +3 Armor after each Location.
ArmorGainKeepsake.epic: Gain +20 Armor. While you have at least 1 Armor, gain +4 Armor after each Location.
ArmorGainKeepsake.heroic: Gain +20 Armor. While you have at least 1 Armor, gain +6 Armor after each Location.

TempHammerKeepsake.name: Experimental Hammer

TempHammerKeepsake.rare: Gain 1 random Daedalus Hammer that lasts for 15 Encounters.
TempHammerKeepsake.epic: Gain 1 random Daedalus Hammer that lasts for 20 Encounters.
TempHammerKeepsake.heroic: Gain 1 random Daedalus Hammer that lasts for 30 Encounters.

FountainRarityKeepsake.name: Aromatic Phial
FountainRarityKeepsake.common: Fountains restore +20% Health. The next makes 1 random Common Boon of yours Rare.
FountainRarityKeepsake.rare: Fountains restore +20% Health. The next makes 1 random Common Boon of yours Epic.
FountainRarityKeepsake.epic: Fountains restore +20% Health. The next makes 1 random Common Boon of yours Heroic.

UnpickedBoonKeepsake.name: Concave Stone

UnpickedBoonKeepsake.rare: After choosing a Boon, 50% of the time randomly take 1 more, once this night.
UnpickedBoonKeepsake.epic: After choosing a Boon, 75% of the time randomly take 1 more, once this night.
UnpickedBoonKeepsake.heroic: After choosing a Boon, 100% of the time randomly take 1 more, once this night.

SkipEncounterKeepsake.name: Fig Leaf
